mapper.select: SELECT a.priimg_name priimg_name, a.pri_weekprice pri_weekprice, a.pri_title pri_title, a.pri_addr pri_addr, a.pri_num pri_num, a.pri_long pri_long, a.pri_lat pri_lat, a.pri_hits pri_hits FROM (SELECT i.priimg_name priimg_name, p.pri_weekprice pri_weekprice, p.pri_title pri_title, p.pri_addr pri_addr, p.pri_num pri_num, p.pri_long pri_long, p.pri_lat pri_lat, p.pri_hits pri_hits FROM privatelot p JOIN privateimage i ON p.pri_num = i.pri_num ORDER BY to_number(substr(p.pri_num, 5)) )a WHERE pri_num IN (SELECT BM_SELNUM FROM BOOKMARK WHERE BM_CATEGORY ='공간' AND u_id = #{u_id} )
